product_name: 3M Ultrathon Sponge-Top Insect Repellent - 34 Percent DEET - 1.5 oz.
long_description: 3M Ultrathon Sponge-Top insect repellent goes on easily to provide all-day relief from biting insects. Convenient sponge applicator lets you apply insect repellent lotion while keeping your hands clean. Time-release formula provides up to 12 hrs. of protection; resists rain, water splashes and perspiration. Active ingredient 34.34% DEET offers a high level of protection against mosquitoes, ticks, flies and other insects. DEET (N, N-Dimethyl-metatoluamide) is the most effective insect repellent available. 3M Ultrathon insect repellent lotion absorbs quickly; features a light outdoor scent.
short_description: 3M Ultrathon Sponge-Top insect repellent goes on easily to provide all-day relief from biting insects.
